title: Backend Engineer
description: Developing new features and API endpoints, fixing bugs in the app's web server using C#, Entity Framework, and .NET Core.
Writing C# unit and integration tests in order to achieve a comprehensive backend test suite.
Worked in engineering support investigating, diagnosing, and triaging bugs in the production system reported by clients.
Formulating SQL scripts to investigate and fix corrupt data in the production database.
Creating documentation for engineering processes and features of the application.

title: Software Engineer
description: Worked cross-functionally with Design and Product teams to build A/B experiments on major site surface areas aimed at increasing leads and conversions for MC's consumer and enterprise products.
Developed frontend components using React, TypeScript, and Next.js by leveraging MC's design system as well as building from scratch.
Thoroughly tested frontend components and user flows using Jest and React Testing Library to ensure highest code quality and correctness.

title: Full Stack Developer
description: Built website based on client requirements to market the company and its products.
Integrated blog into website using Node.js backend interacting with MongoDB database, external API, and 3rd-party authentication provider.
Developed web pages using HTML, SCSS, and JavaScript while employing responsive web development and website accessibility best practices.

title: Web Developer Intern
description: Spearheaded and executed complete website redesign from initial design mockups in Figma to website development.
Built responsive, accessible web pages using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
Collaborated closely with Museum Director regarding museum initiatives.
